projects.title: Corporate Training Video
projects.description: Voice-over translation for a series of corporate training videos

projects.title: Nature Documentary Subtitling

projects.details: Our team created accurate and culturally appropriate subtitles for a nature documentary, enabling it to reach a global audience without losing its educational value. This project demonstrates our expertise in subtitling and localization.
